articles.title: Meta unveils a haptic GLOVE that lets you feel objects in VR - Daily Mail
articles.description: The glove, unveiled by Meta Reality Labs in Menlo Park, California, is lined with a series of small air pockets called actuators along the palms and fingers that inflate to create a sense of touch.
articles.content:
Meta (formerly Facebook) has unveiled a haptic glove prototype that lets users feel objects in virtual reality (VR).
